        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.       VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>It could be multiple bugs, different pocs print different asan, including a uaf and a stack-use-after-return.<span class="line"><!---->It could be multiple bugs, different pocs print different asan, including a uaf and a stack-use-after-return.<!----></span><br>But they are in the same webui, so I merged them to a report to you.<span class="line"><!---->But they are in the same webui, so I merged them to a report to you.<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<!----></span><br>Operating System: Chrome<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Chrome<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <span class="line"><!---->1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in         > Renato, it seems we create oobe webui in the session too?<span class="line"><!---->&gt; Renato, it seems we create oobe webui in the session too?<!----></span><br>I don't think that the WebUI is being created in session automatically. The reporter had to navigate to 'chrome://oobe' in order to trigger the WebUI creation.<span class="line"><!---->I don't think that the WebUI is being created in session automatically.         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.       VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>It could be multiple bugs, different pocs print different asan, including a uaf and a stack-use-after-return.<span class="line"><!---->It could be multiple bugs, different pocs print different asan, including a uaf and a stack-use-after-return.<!----></span><br>But they are in the same webui, so I merged them to a report to you.<span class="line"><!---->But they are in the same webui, so I merged them to a report to you.<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<!----></span><br>Operating System: Chrome<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Chrome<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <span class="line"><!---->1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <!----></span>https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&alt=media<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media"><!---->https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media<!----></a><br><br>2. run: `out/chromeos/chrome --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm2`<span class="line"><!---->2. run: `out/chromeos/chrome --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm2`<!----></span><br>[1] poc1(uaf)<span class="line"><!---->[1] poc1(uaf)<!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://oobe` and open devtools<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://oobe` and open devtools<!----></span><br>execute `chrome.send("startDemoModeSetupForTesting", ["tBaEkeIfZaCQqibVZbXyRgrGurDVTuPbIKYNfLpaRjwJXYkMdNgRFZTGEERffXdgCsldNZzvlPOniGVmReBPbXyKNQQh", false, [], false, 4.0]);` in console.<span class="line"><!---->execute `chrome.send("startDemoModeSetupForTesting", class="line"><!---->[2] poc2(stack use after return)<!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://oobe` and open devtools<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://oobe` and open devtools<!----></span><br>execute `chrome.send("updateOobeUIState", ["tBaEkeIfZaCQqibVZbXyRgrGurDVTuPbIKYNfLpaRjwJXYkMdNgRFZTGEERffXdgCsldNZzvlPOniGVmReBPbXyKNQQh", false, [], false, 4.0]);` in         Sorry, I don't think I have cycles to fix the tests, but looking at _api_features.json all the following WebUIs support WebViews:<span class="line"><!---->Sorry, I don't think I have cycles to fix the tests, but looking at _api_features.json all the following WebUIs support WebViews:<!----></span><br>      "chrome://assistant-optin/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://assistant-optin/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://add-supervision/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://add-supervision/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://chrome-signin/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://chrome-signin/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://discards/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://discards/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://mobilesetup/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://mobilesetup/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://oobe/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://oobe/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://os-settings/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://os-settings/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://parent-access/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://parent-access/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://password-change/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://password-change/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://lock-reauth/*"<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://lock-reauth/*"<!----></span><br><br>You could try changing the URL in those tests to one of the above and see if the tests work.<span class="line"><!---->You could try changing the URL in those tests to one of the above and see if the tests work.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>It could be multiple bugs, different pocs print different asan, including a uaf and a stack-use-after-return.<span class="line"><!---->It could be multiple bugs, different pocs print different asan, including a uaf and a stack-use-after-return.<!----></span><br>But they are in the same webui, so I merged them to a report to you.<span class="line"><!---->But they are in the same webui, so I merged them to a report to you.<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: [stable, beta, or dev]<!----></span><br>Operating System: Chrome<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Chrome<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <span class="line"><!---->1. Download asan-linux-release-1015312 in <!----></span>https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&alt=media<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media"><!---->https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/chromium-browser-asan/o/linux-release-chromeos%2Fasan-linux-release-1015312.zip?generation=1655469268278292&amp;alt=media<!----></a><br><br>2. run: `out/chromeos/chrome --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm2`<span class="line"><!---->2. run: `out/chromeos/chrome --use-system-clipboard --user-data-dir=./chromeos_vm2`<!----></span><br>[1] poc1(uaf)<span class="line"><!---->[1] poc1(uaf)<!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://oobe` and open devtools<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://oobe` and open devtools<!----></span><br>execute `chrome.send("startDemoModeSetupForTesting", ["tBaEkeIfZaCQqibVZbXyRgrGurDVTuPbIKYNfLpaRjwJXYkMdNgRFZTGEERffXdgCsldNZzvlPOniGVmReBPbXyKNQQh", false, [], false, 4.0]);` in console.<span class="line"><!---->execute `chrome.send("startDemoModeSetupForTesting", class="line"><!---->[2] poc2(stack use after return)<!----></span><br>browsing `chrome://oobe` and open devtools<span class="line"><!---->browsing `chrome://oobe` and open devtools<!----></span><br>execute `chrome.send("updateOobeUIState", ["tBaEkeIfZaCQqibVZbXyRgrGurDVTuPbIKYNfLpaRjwJXYkMdNgRFZTGEERffXdgCsldNZzvlPOniGVmReBPbXyKNQQh", false, [], false, 4.0]);` in         Sorry, I don't think I have cycles to fix the tests, but looking at _api_features.json all the following WebUIs support WebViews:<span class="line"><!---->Sorry, I don't think I have cycles to fix the tests, but looking at _api_features.json all the following WebUIs support WebViews:<!----></span><br>      "chrome://assistant-optin/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://assistant-optin/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://add-supervision/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://add-supervision/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://chrome-signin/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://chrome-signin/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://discards/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://discards/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://mobilesetup/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://mobilesetup/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://oobe/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://oobe/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://os-settings/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://os-settings/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://parent-access/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://parent-access/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://password-change/*",<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://password-change/*",<!----></span><br>      "chrome://lock-reauth/*"<span class="line"><!---->      "chrome://lock-reauth/*"<!----></span><br><br>You could try changing the URL in those tests to one of the above and see if the tests work.<span class="line"><!---->You could try changing the URL in those tests to one of the above and see if the tests work.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        This issue requires additional review before it can be merged to the LTS channel. Please answer the following questions to help us evaluate this merge:<span class="line"><!---->This issue requires additional review before it can be merged to the LTS channel. Please answer the following questions to help us evaluate this merge:<!----></span><br><br>1. Number of CLs needed for this fix and links to them.<span class="line"><!---->1. Number of CLs needed for this fix and links to them.<!----></span><br>2. Level of complexity (High, Medium, Low - Explain)<span class="line"><!---->2. Level of complexity (High, Medium, Low - Explain)<!----></span><br>3. Has this been merged to a stable release? beta release?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has this been merged to a stable release? beta release?<!----></span><br>4. Overall Recommendation (Yes, No)<span class="line"><!---->4. Overall Recommendation (Yes, No)<!----></span><br><br><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
